Happy New Year~!

Download and play Best kids songs and Musical stories whenever / wherever (waiting rooms, doctor's appointments and long trips!) Use the app offline.

We fixed minor bugs.
# Supporting apple watch
# Adding a preview function
# Random play / Automatically play all songs' function stabilized
